summary: While vacationing on a remote Scandanavian island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.
cast: Max von Sydow|Liv Ullmann|Gertrud Fridh|Georg Rydeberg|Erland Josephson|Naima Wifstrand|Ulf Johansson|Gudrun Brost|Bertil Anderberg|Ingrid Thulin|Agda Helin|Lenn Hjortzberg|Mikael Rundquist|Folke Sundquist
title: La hora del lobo
